name: Super Chick
storyline: In the whimsical world of Super Chick, our cute hero embarks on a grand quest to reach the top and restore harmony. Starting in the bustling City, Super Chick leaps onto cars and rooftops, then ventures into the peaceful Park, sugary chaos of Candyland, rich Chocolate Land, and scenic Beach. Ascending higher, Super Chick faces trials in the ethereal Heaven before reaching the ultimate challenge in God Land. Each realm presents unique platforming challenges, puzzles, and foes. With determination and agility, Super Chick aims to ascend to the pinnacle and bring light to the world. Engage in solo or multiplayer modes, where you can compete or playfully sabotage each other, jumping, dodging, and smiling through this captivating rage-platformer. Super Chick: where the only way is up!
summary: Introducing Super Chick, a captivating rage-platformer wrapped in an irresistibly cute aesthetic. Engage in solo or online multiplayer modes, where you can compete or playfully sabotage each other. Get ready to jump, dodge, and smile your way through Super Chick – where the only way is up!
